biography: Birgit Doll was an Austrian stage and film actress and theatre director. She graduated at the Max Reinhardt Seminar in 1976 and made her stage debut at the Salzburg State Theater. Birgit Doll has worked with Ingmar Bergman, Michael Haneke,  Maximilian Schell, Otto Schenk and Peter Patzak.
name: Birgit Doll
